authors: Sophie Goulopoulos For Daily Mail Australia
description: Stepping out at the Australian Open in Melbourne, the Australia's Got Talent judge wore a Lillian Xu dress featuring an enormous black bow across the chest.
title: Sophie Monk cuts an outlandish figure at the Australian Open
title_page: Sophie Monk cuts an outlandish figure at the Australian Open | Daily Mail Online
text:
She was recently crowned Sexy Australian Of The Year 2016, and on Thursday, Sophie Monk quite literally became a gift of the gods courtesy of her outlandish designer dress.
Stepping out at the Australian Open in Melbourne, the Australia's Got Talent judge wore a Lillian Xu dress featuring an enormous black bow across the chest.
The 36-year-old was attending the Ladies Power Lunch function at Rod Laver Arena alongside other guests such as Natalie Bassingthwaighte and Real Housewife Andrea Moss.
Scroll down for video
'I'm a present today': Sophie Monk stepped out at ladies' luncheon for the Australian Open on Thursday in grey strapless frock with big black bow
Sharing a snap to Instagram early in the day, Sophie wrote in her slightly self-deprecating sense of humor: 'I'm a present today ha.'
The strapless grey marle frock landed just above her knees, and appeared to be constructed using fused neoprene - a thicker fabric for the cool Melbourne weather.
She paired the look with some studded platform pumps by Christian Louboutin, and allowing for the dress to speak for itself, she opted for very minimal jewellery.
All wrapped up! The strapless grey marle frock, designed by Sydney-based label Lillian Xu
Making a statement: She paired the look with some studded platform pumps by Christian Louboutin, and allowing for the dress to speak for itself, she opted for very minimal jewellery
Casual: Natalie Bassingthwaighte however was less formally dressed, wearing a simple, khaki singlet dress and battered white sneakers
Adding a touch of sexiness to her look, the radio host's lips were painted a rich glossy red, with her luscious blonde tresses cascading over her shoulders in loose waves.
Posing with her left hand on her hip, the blonde beauty flaunted her toned arms and trim pins as she popped her hip slightly.
Natalie however was less formally dressed, wearing a simple, khaki singlet dress and battered white sneakers.
Lovely: Real Housewife of Melbourne Andrea looked glamorous in an white brocade minidress and went for white strappy wedges
All black: Fellow Neighbours stars were also in attendance, including Ashleigh Brewer, who opted for an all-black ensemble, and Krista Vendy, also in black
Appearing fresh-faced, the former Neighbours star cinched her waist with a leopard-print shirt and kept jewellery to a minimum also.
Fellow Neighbours stars were also in attendance, including Ashleigh Brewer, who opted for an all-black ensemble, and Krista Vendy, also in black.
Real Housewife of Melbourne Andrea looked glamorous in an white brocade minidress and went for white strappy wedges.
Meanwhile Shane Warne's ex wife Simone Callahan dressed in a slightly bohemian white linen frock with tan sandals.
